comment_text: I don't think it's necessary to read *Jane Eyre* first to enjoy *The Eyre Affair* if you don't want to. Just bear two things in mind: 1) If you're in two minds by the end of the book, give *Lost in a Good Book* a chance, and 2) *The Eyre Affair* spoils the hell out of *Jane Eyre*, and *Lost in a Good Book* spoils *Great Expectations*.
author: satanspanties

comment_text: The Eyre Affair is one of my favorite books. I've read it several times and never read Jane Eyre. So, give it a go!
author: sassyma

comment_text:
Sure, this sounds fun. I also included some non-fiction because you included GEB, which is definitely not a novel. This is my list of *favorites*, which is not the same as my list of *best novels* or anything like that. *The Eyre Affair* and *Use of Weapons* would fall somewhere on my list of "almost favorite novels". 

**Fiction**:

- *Anathem*, Neal Stephenson  
- *Picoverse*, Robert A Metzger  
- *Cusp*, Robert A Metzger  
- *Manifold: Time*, Stephen Baxter  
- *The Forge of God*, Greg Bear
- *The Light of Other Days*, Arthur C Clarke and Stephen Baxter  
- *The Sparrow*, Mary Doria Russel  
- *The Player of Games*, Iain M Banks  
- *A Canticle for Liebowitz*, Walter M Miller, Jr  
- *Adventures in Time and Space*, Various (collection of short stories)  
- *The Clan of the Cave Bear*, Jean M Auel  
- *Necronomicon: The Best Weird Tales*, H P Lovecraft (collection)  
- *The Metamorphosis and Other Stories*, Fraz Kafka (collection)
- *Harry Potter and the _____*, J K Rowling 
- *The Complete Sherlock Holmes*, Sir Arthur Conan Doyle  
- *Artemis Fowl*, Eoin Colfer 
- Inheritance series, Christopher Paolini (Eragon, etc.) 
- Thrawn series, Timothy Zahn (Heir to the Empire, etc.) 

**Non-fiction**:

- *Godel, Escher, Bach: An Eternal Golden Braid*, Douglas Hofstadter 
- *Euler's Gem: The Polyhedron Formula and the Birth of Topology*, David S Richeson  
- *The Honors Class: Hilbert's Problems and Their Solvers*, Ben H Yandell  
- *A Primate's Memoir*, Robert M Sapolsky
- *The Strangest Man: The Hidden Life of Paul Dirac, Mystic of the Atom*, Graham Farmelo  
- *The Elegant Universe*, Brian Greene
author: InfanticideAquifer
